lore: Helmholtz and Milner, two Magi of legend, had the idea of uniting every kingdom into one country to stop the impending catastrophe. After long talks were had and deals struck, six kingdoms acceded, but the rest rebelled after their refusal.\n\nThe Siralim Seraph's blade represents courage, a flame that no storm can extinguish. It leaves a trail of fire that fills people's hearts with bravery. If its allies are in danger, it channels every last drop of its energy into a barrier that few can pierce.
menagerieDialog: Long past are the days when we brandished our swords for a real cause... Have you even tried speaking with your enemy before resorting to violence?
Trust no one. Even the gods are known for their paper-thin allegiances.
When a kingdom falls, its Seraph is destroyed as well. Perhaps humans should think twice before blindly heading to war with each other.
I am proud to serve under the {CASTLENAME} banner. Thank you for having me.
I find it difficult to trust humans. Do not let me down.
name: Siralim Seraph
